flights.title: West Coast Park
flights.notes: Early morning golden hour flight over the park. Captured the sunrise light filtering through the trees.

flights.title: Racing in the office again
flights.notes: Another indoor FPV racing session through the office.

flights.title: Racing in the office
flights.notes: Racing through the office corridors. Testing the whoop indoors for the first time.

gear.name: DJI Mini 5 Pro
gear.subtitle: Primary cinematic drone
gear.description: Slow, deliberate flights. Landscapes, architecture, cinematic cars and people.

gear.name: BetaFPV Air65
gear.subtitle: 1S micro whoop for indoor flying
gear.description: Fast and raw. First-person racing footage, proximity flying, and the occasional crash.
